name: Arachne's Den
description:
This prototype game was concepted and created in 7 weeks by a small and dedicated team of student devs at the School of Game Development @ Academy of Art University.

 

You have stumbled across a cave, and upon entering you find the spider queen, Arachne, that’s been ruining your village!  It is your job to destroy Arachne with your trusty sword and save your village from doom.

 

Kristian Martinez, 2nd year, Game Design Duties: Scripting, Implement Animations

 

Maricelle Gonzales, 2nd year, 3D Character Modeler

Duties:  Enemy Character Modeler, Implement UI, Marketing

 

Dane Muller, 2nd year, Environment Modeler

Duties:  Environment, Art Direction, Lighting

 

Joel Schilling, 2nd year, 3D Character Modeler

Duties:  Hero Character Modeler, Task Manager, Marketing

 

Qianqi Jin, 2nd year, Concept Art

Duties:  Gameplay UI, Marketing, 2D Art
